basics.name: Yukun Tian
basics.label: Undergraduate
basics.summary: New Researcher in Community | Hands-on Enthusiast | Coding Dev | IEEE/CCF Student Member | ACGN Lover | Amateur Photographer

work.name: School of Computer Science, Southeast University
work.summary: Under the supervise of Professor Hao Chen and Professor Ruiting Zhou.

work.name: 3SE Robot Team (RoboMaster), Southeast University
work.summary: I led the R&D of my school's Robot Team in Season 2024. (Mainly on vision tasks üëÅ).

work.name: NAIE department, Huawei Nanjing Research Center
work.summary: I worked in the AI Model and Training Service Group where I mainly focused on operators dev for Ascend and CANN.

volunteer.organization: Southeast University Education Foundation, Rongjiang No.1 Middle School
volunteer.summary: I volunteered to teach in remote and underdeveloped areas during the summer vacation, aiming to spread the knowledge and ideas to a wider region, providing support for the rural revitalization strategy with the energy of young talents.
highlights: Nominated for the Top Ten Social Practice Awards at Southeast University
Xinhuanet and other authoritative media have reported on this, with over 56,000 total views

volunteer.organization: Guangzhou Huadu District Center for Disease Prevention and Control
volunteer.summary: The activity included volunteer services, Spring Festival visits and in-depth interviews. Team members assisted the elderly, collaborated with local authorities for festive outreach and we designed two new products to better assist elderly patients in their daily lives.
highlights: First Prize in the Social Practice Competition at Southeast University (3%), Outstanding Individual Award, Outstanding Team Award
Extensive media coverage across newspapers, television, and online news platforms, with over 42,000 total views
Obtain authorizations for two utility model patents

awards.title: 2024 RoboMaster University Championship, Final Tournament
awards.awarder: National First Prize (Best in school history)
awards.summary: As the vision group leader, I developed neural network-based object detection and tracking algorithms, ensuring accurate vision processing during competitions. Our team achieved the best results in school history.

awards.title: 2024 RoboMaster University Championship, Hero Robot Combat Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding performance in the Hero robot combat category.

awards.title: 2024 RoboMaster University Championship, Regional Competition
awards.summary: Led the vision team in designing real-time vision algorithms for object recognition and tracking. Our work contributed significantly to winning the provincial first prize.

awards.title: 2024 RoboMaster University League, Shanghai Province
awards.summary: Responsible for vision tasks, including implementing real-time object detection and target tracking. Helped secure the provincial third prize for the team.

awards.title: 2023 13th China Educational Robot Competition, Regular & Challenge Seasons (As Captain)
awards.awarder: National Special Prize & National First Prize (Champion)
awards.summary: As team captain, I led the team to victory by overseeing core motion control and path planning algorithm development, while managing work distribution and team coordination.

awards.title: 2023 RoboMaster University League, Jiangsu Province (Responsible for Motion Control)
awards.summary: As a member of the motion control team in developing advanced control strategies that secured the provincial second prize.

awards.title: 2022 12th China Educational Robot Competition, Regular & Challenge Seasons (As Captain)
awards.awarder: National Special Prize & National First Prize (Champion)
awards.summary: As captain, I led the team to a national special prize by directing the development of motion control and path planning algorithms, guiding the team to victory.

honors.name: National Scholarship
honors.issuer: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

publications.name: EventAug: Multifaceted Spatio-Temporal Data Augmentation Methods for Event-based Learning
publications.summary: For more information, please refer to Publication page.

publications.name: Image Retargeting: A Dataset and Metrics

languages.fluency: CET6: 603, have been to 7 countries, great oral and written skills

references.name: Professor Hao Chen
references.reference: Associate Professor in the Key Laboratory of New Generation Artificial Intelligence Technology&Its Interdisciplinary Applications, one of my advisors in the Southeast University.

references.name: Professor Ruiting Zhou
references.reference: Professor in the School of Computer Science, Southeast University, one of my advisors in the Southeast University.

projects.name: Design of an Autonomous Decision-Making Navigation and Precision Strike Robot Based on Laser SLAM and Machine Vision
projects.summary: As a core team member, I am responsible for robot motion control, embedded development, and part of the computer vision algorithm development. This project received an excellent rating during the conclusion acceptance defense.

projects.name: Event Information-Guided Multimodal Fusion Video Camouflage Object Detection Method
projects.summary: As the leading student researcher, I am responsible for the overall project development and technical solution design. I have already submitted a paper as the first author to AAAI 2025.
highlights: Ministry of Education Key Laboratory Open Project for Young Scholars

projects.name: High-Performance Heterogeneous Collaborative Computing System for Mobile CPUs and GPUs for Complex Deep Neural Networks
projects.summary: As the primary student researcher, I am in charge of the overall technical solution design and algorithm development. We are planning to submit our work to MobiCom 2025.
highlights: Student Research Training Project of Jiangsu Province

projects.name: Design and Application of Motion Target Identification and Prediction Models for Low-Latency Scenarios
projects.summary: As a core team member, I am responsible for the development of computer vision algorithms, model training and fine-tuning, and low-latency deployment on the robots.
highlights: Student Research Training Project of Jiangsu Province

projects.name: Efficient OFA
projects.summary: As one of the primary student researcher, I am in charge of the overall technical solution design and algorithm development. We are planning to submit our work to ATC 2025 or ASPLOS 2025.
